item.title: Automated WireGuard VPN Deployment on Scaleway Cloud with Terraform and Ansible
item.description:
Overview

This project focuses on the automation of a WireGuard VPN server on Scaleway’s cloud infrastructure using Terraform, Ansible, Jinja2 Templates, and shell scripts. The automation is designed to provision, configure, and maintain WireGuard instances using Shell scripts. The project includes scripts for both deployment and destruction of the infrastructure, along with templates for the WireGuard server and client configurations.

Key Components

  • Terraform: Used for provisioning the infrastructure.
  • Ansible: Used for configuration management of the WireGuard VPN.
  • Jinja2 Configuration Templates: For generating WireGuard configurations dynamically.
  • Shell Scripts: For automation of deployment and teardown.

Welcome to Cusable!

Hey there, I’m Nick. I’m really glad you’ve made your way here. This space is all about my love for technology and automation—a place where I share what I’ve learned with fellow tech enthusiasts, business owners, or anyone who’s just curious about how to make technology work better for them.

Why “Cusable”?

The name “Cusable” comes from the idea of blending customization and usability. My goal is simple: to make tech solutions that aren’t just powerful, but also practical and easy to use. Whether I’m automating tasks to save time, securing networks, or working on projects like my Automated Wireguard VPN, I’m always focused on solving real problems in a way that feels accessible and useful.
